thread.title: Grant Hackett thanks family for support during 'toughest week' of his life
thread.title_full: Grant Hackett thanks family for support during 'toughest week' of his life

title: Grant Hackett thanks family for support during 'toughest week' of his life
text:
The rate debate The rate debate 
Changes to penalty rates have long been protested and debated. This is where it currently sits, and what might change. More videos Family's plea to help Hackett 
The family of Grant Hackett described the Olympic swimming great as "dangerousâ" and in desperate need of help after his arrest at his parent's Gold Coast home. Courtesy Seven Network 
The 36-year-old has thanked his family, in particular his parents, for their support through "the toughest week of my life". 
"They have been amazing and have now stood by me through thick and thin - I can't say enough about them - I could not wish for better parents," Hackett said in a statement to AAP. Related Content
